channel.title: 508 Bulby magic on player help
channel.description:
So ive been coding a bulby based source for a while and i noticed the bug so u can barrage people even if their outside of wildy. Anyone know how to fix this? and barrage didnt drain runes either, i know u can fix this in magic.java but that tab is so messy it gives me errors...
If anyone knows how to fix the first one please post!
